rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with access to outdoor patio. Windows oriented north to ensure balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen

rooms.name: Library

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated work space featuring built-in storage and desk; positioned away from distractions as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room on the ground floor for easy accessibility; adjacent to living space.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
